body_html:
@orionr @ezyang For the record, adding those 4 lines of import in setup.py will result in build failures.

(venv)[yinghai:pytorch: (fbsync)]$ python setup.py install
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "setup.py", line 800, in <module>
    extra_link_args=extra_link_args + main_link_args + [make_relative_rpath('lib')],
  File "/data/users/yinghai/aml/venv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/setuptools/extension.py", line 39, in __init__
    _Extension.__init__(self, name, sources, *args, **kw)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/distutils/extension.py", line 106, in __init__
    assert type(name) is StringType, "'name' must be a string"
AssertionError: 'name' must be a string

body:
@orionr @ezyang For the record, adding those 4 lines of import in `setup.py` will result in build failures. 
```
(venv)[yinghai:pytorch: (fbsync)]$ python setup.py install
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "setup.py", line 800, in <module>
    extra_link_args=extra_link_args + main_link_args + [make_relative_rpath('lib')],
  File "/data/users/yinghai/aml/venv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/setuptools/extension.py", line 39, in __init__
    _Extension.__init__(self, name, sources, *args, **kw)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/distutils/extension.py", line 106, in __init__
    assert type(name) is StringType, "'name' must be a string"
AssertionError: 'name' must be a string
```
